name: Daily Alchemy
description: Master the art of potion brewing and ingredient gathering.
Create valuable potions and collect rare alchemical components.
Supply the city with essential healing and magical supplies.

objectives.deliver_healing: Deliver healing potions to city healer
objectives.deliver_combat: Deliver combat potions to weapon trainer

dialogs.start1: Welcome to my laboratory. The city has great need for potions today.
dialogs.start2: I have a special formula that requires rare ingredients. Are you up for the challenge?
dialogs.player_interested: I'm ready to learn the alchemical arts and serve the city.
dialogs.ingredients: Remember - quality ingredients make quality potions. Gather only the finest materials.
dialogs.merchant_request: These potions will sell well. The adventurers always need good supplies.
dialogs.healer_need: Thank you for these healing potions. They'll save many lives in the clinic.
dialogs.complete1: Magnificent work! Your potions are of exceptional quality.
dialogs.player_success: The brewing process was challenging but very rewarding.
dialogs.complete2: You have the makings of a master alchemist. The city is in your debt.
